title: Slow-kindled Courage (7U328)
text:
Set:	The Return of the King
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Bearer must be Merry or Pippin. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to bearer of Slow-kindled Courage.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and remove 2 burdens.
Rarity:	U
